title: Countries with the most affected people from earthquakes 1900 to 2016
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories for the x axis representing Country, and a y axis representing Number of affected people (in millions).
The highest category is found at China where Number of affected people (in millions) is 70.9.
The lowest category is found at Haiti where Number of affected people (in millions) is 3.4.
gold: This statistic shows the Number of affected people in countries with the greatest earthquake occurrence from 1900 to 2016 . During this period , about 70.9 million people in China were affected by earthquakes .
